Sears, Roebuck & Rosenwald

Picture yourself in the late 1880’s when most people lived in rural communities with all of the challenges that go with it. Along comes a man named Sears and a man named Roebuck – Richard Warren Sears and Alvah Curtis Roebuck to be exact.
